title: Embroidery: White-on-white, early–mid-16th century
medium:
Medium: Cotton, plain weave (3 narrow strips sewn together)
Technique: Cotton double running stitches
description: Part of embroidered panel.  Joing of 3 pieces needle made edge, the loops of which form two bands placed edge to edge are whipped together.  Linen bobbin lace sewn to 3 edges.
